Package org.w3.y2001.sw.Europe.skos

The Simple Knowledge Organisation System (SKOS) API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ServiceBits A class with SKOS API bits not yet added to the Service class.
SKOSThesaurus The Simple Knowledge Organisation System (SKOS) API
 

Class Summary
Binding A class for a query result binding from an RDF query service.
Concept A class for a SKOS concept identified by either a URI or an external non-URI identifier (descriptor).
ConceptRelatives A class for SKOS concepts related to a concept, possibly by a particular Relation.
Mapping A class for a SKOS semantic mapping between two concepts in two different thesauri.
Relation A class for semantic relations including the URI of the relation along with their description and human readable label.
URI A class for URIs.
 

Package org.w3.y2001.sw.Europe.skos Description

The Simple Knowledge Organisation System (SKOS) API.

This provides access to a thesauri Web Service developed by the Thesaurus Activity of the SWAD-Europe project.

Please send feedback to the public-esw-thes list archived at http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/public-esw-thes/

Dave Beckett, Nikki Rogers, Alistair Miles.
